item.title: Endless Terry Pratchett qoutes
item.description:
Endless Terry Pratchett qoutes

This will come as no surprise to anyone who knows anything about me, my favourite author is Sir Terry Pratchett. Anytime I crave humour, wit, and philosophy, he is the one I turn to. Its no exaggeration when I say that I’m a better person cos of him. One blog post, however often updated, isn’t sufficient for his words. I’m planning on creating a website soon, but until then, here’s a few of my favourite excerpts.
